bot.name: Cognitum
bot.description: This is small statistics and utilities bot for Discord made by The Core Community

help.title: Help
help.description: Showing all available commands and commands usage for every command.

default.title: Error occurred!
default.description: Unexpected error occurred! Try again later or report us about this error at [this Discord guild](https://discord.gg/SbNZQMV) or [in our repository](https://github.com/thecorecity/cognitum/issues/new).

commandNotFound.title: Command #commandName# not found!
commandNotFound.description: Requested command not found! Try #prefix#help to get full commands list.
